text: Perhaps we ’ ll see them get back together, after all : ABC has renewed Splitting Up Together for a second season. Series star Jenna Fischer announced the news in an Instagram Story on Friday : The series, which debuted on March 27, tells the story of Lena ( The Office ‘ s Fischer ) and Martin ( Rules of Engagement ‘ s Oliver Hudson ), longtime marrieds who call it quits, but continue living under one roof to coparent their three children ; Diane Farr ( Numb3rs ), Bobby Lee ( Love ) and Lindsay Price ( Lipstick Jungle ) co - star.
